title: How to write reviews on Amazon without purchasing - Quora

response.answer_text: As you have asked the question, you want to give a review of the product on Amazon without purchasing the product. I would like to tell you that Amazon does not offer any product review without purchasing a product. But according to my experience, I have seen that if you buy a regular product from Amazon, then you can give a review on the product similar to the one you purchased without purchasing any product. But there is no guarantee that it will be live on Sunday or not, it will be a little doubtful, but Amazon does not accept any such wrong way of review.

Scroll down to where the reviews are and click - Write a customer review. I WISH that they hadn’t started putting “Verified Purchases” first. It was a good idea, but here’s what happened… Most very well written and actually helpful reviews got pushed WAY down to the bottom, while the people who actually bought the item write things like this: “I like it.” “It’s nice.” “It arrived on time.” “It arrived with damage.” “It works.” “Not what I thought I would get.” “Boring.” “It was the wrong color…..” And that is ALL. I’m serious. A huge number of reviews that are now on the very top are literally one short line that does not help at all.
